name: SHOPPOTRON
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 40!

SHOPPOTRON loves shopping, but he’s a little bit clumsy. Help guide him through the store to buy all the CPUs! This is a “tank controls” top-down 2D game made in Unity.

Features
  • 12 exciting levels of robot shopping action
  • 1 awkward robot who loves to shop
  • 45 CPUs (probably, I didn’t count them)
Controls
  • WADS, Arrow keys, or control stick to move
  • esc to pause in a level
